# About me:
I graduated in 2017 with a BSc (Hons) Psychology from the University of Glasgow. Currently, I am a postgraduate student at the University of Glasgow's
[Institute of Neuroscience and Psychology](http://www.gla.ac.uk/researchinstitutes/neurosciencepsychology/) under the supervision of [Heather Woods](https://www.gla.ac.uk/schools/psychology/staff/heatherwoods)

#Research Interests
* My research interests include 
        * trypophobia and disgust sensitivity
        * mental disorders 
        * the impact of social media on sleep and emotional wellbeing

My current research project focuses the relationship between sleep quality, emotional wellbeing and social media use in adolescents.
